channel.title: Skill cape help
channel.description: How do i make where when someone gets a 99 skills the skill capes pops up in there inventory?

item.title: Skill cape help
item.dc:creator: @tj007razor tj007razor
item.description:
@tj007razor wrote:

I’m using fake skill capes not real ones but it should be similar to this, just change the item ID’s.
search public void levelup(int skill) and you should have something similar to case 0: // Attack levelup sendMessage("Congratulations, you just advanced an attack level."); break; at 99 to add a skill cape, in each cas add a statement like if (playerLevel[skill] == 99) { sendMessage("Congratulations on getting Level 99 Attack!"); addItem(3777, 1); } except change the level (attack) and the addItem to what you want.

Read full topic
